mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Reality!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this, I strolled into a coffee shop the other day, fully expecting the barista to recognize me as the esteemed CEO of Bank of Entitlement. But to my horror, not only did she not know who I was, but she had the audacity to ask for my name for the order! I felt so slighted, I demanded to speak to the manager and insisted they offer me a free latte as compensation for the emotional distress caused by this grave oversight. And you know what? They did. That's the power of entitlement, my friends!
